description: This is a Flutter application's main source file, defining the main entry point, app widget, and home page with basic UI components including a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen, accepting a title parameter.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, defining the UI layout with app bar and body containing a message and a progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the widgets, constructing the UI layout.
